channel.description: The latest incident information for England's motorway and trunk routes provided by Highways England

image.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events

channel.title: Events for the M5

item.author: info@highwaysengland.co.uk
item.description: Location : The M5 northbound between junctions J19 and J18 . Lane Closures : The hard shoulder and lane 1 are closed. Reason : Broken down vehicle. Status : Currently Active. Time To Clear : The event is expected to clear between 22:30 and 22:45 on 22 April 2022. Return To Normal : Normal traffic conditions are expected between 22:30 and 22:45 on 22 April 2022. Lanes Closed : There is one of four lanes closed.
item.title: M5 northbound between J19 and J18 | Northbound | Broken down vehicle
